Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.4 Sappaṭighaduka » 2.4.3 Paccayavāra » 2.4.3.1--4 Paccayānulomādi » 2.4.3.1--4.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Cūḷantaraduka
Sappaṭighaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayānulomādi
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
65.
688Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
689Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  āpodhātuṃ paccayā appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, āpodhātuṃ paccayā itthindriyaṃ…pe…  kabaḷīkāro āhāro, vatthuṃ paccayā appaṭighā khandhā. (1)
690(Avasesā pañca pañhā paṭiccavārasadisā.)
